chapter.title: Block Storage command-line client
chapter.para: The cinder client is the command-line interface (CLI) for the OpenStack Block Storage API and its extensions. This chapter documents cinder version 1.0.8.
For help on a specific cinder command, enter:

listitem.para: Print a list of absolute limits for a user
List all the availability zones.
Creates a backup.
Remove a backup.
List all the backups.
Restore a backup.
Show details about a backup.
Add a new volume.
Show user credentials returned from auth.
Remove volume(s).
Create a new encryption type for a volume type (Admin Only).
Delete the encryption type for a volume type (Admin Only).
List encryption type information for all volume types (Admin Only).
Show the encryption type information for a volume type (Admin Only).
Discover endpoints that get returned from the authenticate services.
Attempt to extend the size of an existing volume.
Print a list of current 'volume types and extra specs' (Admin Only).
Attempt forced removal of volume(s), regardless of the state(s).
List all the volumes.
Set or Delete metadata on a volume.
Show metadata of given volume.
Update all metadata of a volume.
Migrate the volume to the new host.
Associate qos specs with specific volume type.
Create a new qos specs.
Delete a specific qos specs.
Disassociate qos specs from specific volume type.
Disassociate qos specs from all of its associations.
Get all associations of specific qos specs.
Set or unset specifications for a qos spec.
Get full list of qos specs.
Get a specific qos specs.
List the quotas for a quota class.
Update the quotas for a quota class.
List the default quotas for a tenant.
List the quotas for a tenant.
Update the quotas for a tenant.
List the quota usage for a tenant.
Print a list of rate limits for a user
Update volume read-only access mode read_only.
Rename a volume.
Explicitly update the state of a volume.
Disable the service.
Enable the service.
List all the services. Filter by host & service binary.
Show details about a volume.
Add a new snapshot.
Remove a snapshot.
List all the snapshots.
Set or Delete metadata of a snapshot.
Show metadata of given snapshot.
Update all metadata of a snapshot.
Rename a snapshot.
Explicitly update the state of a snapshot.
Show details about a snapshot.
Accepts a volume transfer.
Creates a volume transfer.
Undo a transfer.
List all the transfers.
Show details about a transfer.
Create a new volume type.
Delete a specific volume type.
Set or unset extra_spec for a volume type.
Print a list of available 'volume types'.
Upload volume to image service as image.
Print arguments for bash_completion.
Display help about this program or one of its subcommands.
List all the os-api extensions that are available.
show program's version number and exit
Print debugging output
Defaults to env[OS_USERNAME].
Defaults to env[OS_PASSWORD].
Defaults to env[OS_TENANT_NAME].
Defaults to env[OS_TENANT_ID].
Defaults to env[OS_AUTH_URL].
Defaults to env[OS_REGION_NAME].
Defaults to volume for most actions
Defaults to env[CINDER_SERVICE_NAME]
Defaults to env[CINDER_VOLUME_SERVICE_NAME]
Defaults to env[CINDER_ENDPOINT_TYPE] or publicURL.
Accepts 1 or 2,defaults to env[OS_VOLUME_API_VERSION].
Specify a CA bundle file to use in verifying a TLS (https) server certificate. Defaults to env[OS_CACERT]
Number of retries.

section.title: cinder absolute-limits command
section.para: Print a list of absolute limits for a user

section.title: cinder availability-zone-list command
section.para: List all the availability zones.

section.title: cinder backup-create command
section.para: Creates a backup.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to backup.
Optional Backup container name. (Default=None)
Optional backup name. (Default=None)
Optional backup description. (Default=None)

section.title: cinder backup-delete command
section.para: Remove a backup.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the backup to delete.

section.title: cinder backup-list command
section.para: List all the backups.

section.title: cinder backup-restore command
section.para: Restore a backup.

listitem.para: ID of the backup to restore.
Optional ID(or name) of the volume to restore to.

section.title: cinder backup-show command
section.para: Show details about a backup.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the backup.

section.title: cinder create command
section.para: Add a new volume.

listitem.para: Size of volume in GB
Create volume from snapshot id (Optional, Default=None)
Create volume from volume id (Optional, Default=None)
Create volume from image id (Optional, Default=None)
Volume name (Optional, Default=None)
Volume description (Optional, Default=None)
Volume type (Optional, Default=None)
Availability zone for volume (Optional, Default=None)
Metadata key=value pairs (Optional, Default=None)

section.title: cinder credentials command
section.para: Show user credentials returned from auth.

section.title: cinder delete command
section.para: Remove volume(s).

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume(s) to delete.

section.title: cinder encryption-type-create command
section.para: Create a new encryption type for a volume type (Admin Only).

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume type
Class providing encryption support (e.g. LuksEncryptor)
Encryption algorithm/mode to use (e.g., aes-xts- plain64) (Optional, Default=None)
Size of the encryption key, in bits (e.g., 128, 256) (Optional, Default=None)
Notional service where encryption is performed (e.g., front-end=Nova). Values: 'front-end', 'back-end' (Optional, Default=None)

section.title: cinder encryption-type-delete command
section.para: Delete the encryption type for a volume type (Admin Only).

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume type

section.title: cinder encryption-type-list command
section.para: List encryption type information for all volume types (Admin Only).

section.title: cinder encryption-type-show command
section.para: Show the encryption type information for a volume type (Admin Only).

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume type

section.title: cinder endpoints command
section.para: Discover endpoints that get returned from the authenticate services.

section.title: cinder extend command
section.para: Attempt to extend the size of an existing volume.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to extend.
New size of volume in GB

section.title: cinder extra-specs-list command
section.para: Print a list of current 'volume types and extra specs' (Admin Only).

section.title: cinder force-delete command
section.para: Attempt forced removal of volume(s), regardless of the state(s).

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume(s) to delete.

section.title: cinder list command
section.para: List all the volumes.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by display-name
Filter results by status
Filter results by metadata

section.title: cinder list-extensions command
section.para: List all the os-api extensions that are available.

section.title: cinder metadata command
section.para: Set or Delete metadata on a volume.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to update metadata on.
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'
Metadata to set/unset (only key is necessary on unset)

section.title: cinder metadata-show command
section.para: Show metadata of given volume.

listitem.para: ID of volume

section.title: cinder metadata-update-all command
section.para: Update all metadata of a volume.

listitem.para: ID of the volume to update metadata on.
Metadata entry/entries to update.

section.title: cinder migrate command
section.para: Migrate the volume to the new host.

listitem.para: ID of the volume to migrate
Destination host
Optional flag to force the use of the generic host- based migration mechanism, bypassing driver optimizations (Default=False).

section.title: cinder qos-associate command
section.para: Associate qos specs with specific volume type.

listitem.para: ID of qos_specs.
ID of volume type to be associated with.

section.title: cinder qos-create command
section.para: Create a new qos specs.

listitem.para: Name of the new QoS specs
Specifications for QoS

section.title: cinder qos-delete command
section.para: Delete a specific qos specs.

listitem.para: ID of the qos_specs to delete.
Optional flag that indicates whether to delete specified qos specs even if it is in-use.

section.title: cinder qos-disassociate command
section.para: Disassociate qos specs from specific volume type.

listitem.para: ID of qos_specs.
ID of volume type to be associated with.

section.title: cinder qos-disassociate-all command
section.para: Disassociate qos specs from all of its associations.

listitem.para: ID of qos_specs to be operate on.

section.title: cinder qos-get-association command
section.para: Get all associations of specific qos specs.

listitem.para: ID of the qos_specs.

section.title: cinder qos-key command
section.para: Set or unset specifications for a qos spec.

listitem.para: ID of qos specs
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'
QoS specs to set/unset (only key is necessary on unset)

section.title: cinder qos-list command
section.para: Get full list of qos specs.

section.title: cinder qos-show command
section.para: Get a specific qos specs.

listitem.para: ID of the qos_specs to show.

section.title: cinder quota-class-show command
section.para: List the quotas for a quota class.

listitem.para: Name of quota class to list the quotas for.

section.title: cinder quota-class-update command
section.para: Update the quotas for a quota class.

listitem.para: Name of quota class to set the quotas for.
New value for the "volumes" quota.
New value for the "snapshots" quota.
New value for the "gigabytes" quota.
Volume type (Optional, Default=None)

section.title: cinder quota-defaults command
section.para: List the default quotas for a tenant.

listitem.para: UUID of tenant to list the default quotas for.

section.title: cinder quota-show command
section.para: List the quotas for a tenant.

listitem.para: UUID of tenant to list the quotas for.

section.title: cinder quota-update command
section.para: Update the quotas for a tenant.

listitem.para: UUID of tenant to set the quotas for.
New value for the "volumes" quota.
New value for the "snapshots" quota.
New value for the "gigabytes" quota.
Volume type (Optional, Default=None)

section.title: cinder quota-usage command
section.para: List the quota usage for a tenant.

listitem.para: UUID of tenant to list the quota usage for.

section.title: cinder rate-limits command
section.para: Print a list of rate limits for a user

section.title: cinder readonly-mode-update command
section.para: Update volume read-only access mode read_only.

listitem.para: ID of the volume to update.
Flag to indicate whether to update volume to read-only access mode.

section.title: cinder rename command
section.para: Rename a volume.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to rename.
New display-name for the volume.
Optional volume description. (Default=None)

section.title: cinder reset-state command
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a volume.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the volume. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: cinder service-disable command
section.para: Disable the service.

listitem.para: Name of host.
Service binary.

section.title: cinder service-enable command
section.para: Enable the service.

listitem.para: Name of host.
Service binary.

section.title: cinder service-list command
section.para: List all the services. Filter by host & service binary.

listitem.para: Name of host.
Service binary.

section.title: cinder show command
section.para: Show details about a volume.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume.

section.title: cinder snapshot-create command
section.para: Add a new snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to snapshot
Optional flag to indicate whether to snapshot a volume even if it's attached to an instance. (Default=False)
Optional snapshot name. (Default=None)
Optional snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: cinder snapshot-delete command
section.para: Remove a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to delete.

section.title: cinder snapshot-list command
section.para: List all the snapshots.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by display-name
Filter results by status
Filter results by volume-id

section.title: cinder snapshot-metadata command
section.para: Set or Delete metadata of a snapshot.

listitem.para: ID of the snapshot to update metadata on.
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'
Metadata to set/unset (only key is necessary on unset)

section.title: cinder snapshot-metadata-show command
section.para: Show metadata of given snapshot.

listitem.para: ID of snapshot

section.title: cinder snapshot-metadata-update-all command
section.para: Update all metadata of a snapshot.

listitem.para: ID of the snapshot to update metadata on.
Metadata entry/entries to update.

section.title: cinder snapshot-rename command
section.para: Rename a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot.
New display-name for the snapshot.
Optional snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: cinder snapshot-reset-state command
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the snapshot. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: cinder snapshot-show command
section.para: Show details about a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot.

section.title: cinder transfer-accept command
section.para: Accepts a volume transfer.

listitem.para: ID of the transfer to accept.
Auth key of the transfer to accept.

section.title: cinder transfer-create command
section.para: Creates a volume transfer.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to transfer.
Optional transfer name. (Default=None)

section.title: cinder transfer-delete command
section.para: Undo a transfer.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the transfer to delete.

section.title: cinder transfer-list command
section.para: List all the transfers.

section.title: cinder transfer-show command
section.para: Show details about a transfer.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the transfer to accept.

section.title: cinder type-create command
section.para: Create a new volume type.

listitem.para: Name of the new volume type

section.title: cinder type-delete command
section.para: Delete a specific volume type.

listitem.para: Unique ID of the volume type to delete

section.title: cinder type-key command
section.para: Set or unset extra_spec for a volume type.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume type
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'
Extra_specs to set/unset (only key is necessary on unset)

section.title: cinder type-list command
section.para: Print a list of available 'volume types'.

section.title: cinder upload-to-image command
section.para: Upload volume to image service as image.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the volume to upload to an image
Name for created image
Optional flag to indicate whether to upload a volume even if it's attached to an instance. (Default=False)
Optional type for container format (Default=bare)
Optional type for disk format (Default=raw)
